column10: Calm and peaceful
column12: A comfortable hotel conveniently located close to the city.  The bed was large and comfortable.  Food was very tasty and the staff were keen to please.  Sahath was particularly eager and attentive with a ready smile for all guests.  A very relaxing stay - thank you.

column6: {'id': '4476135', 'name': 'Rajarata Hotel Anuradapura', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1052, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.330646, 'longitude': 80.419044, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d4476135-Reviews-Rajarata_Hotel_Anuradapura-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.rajaratahotel.lk', 'address': '77, Rowing Club Road Anuradapura, Anuradhapura 50000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '77, Rowing Club Road', 'street2': 'Anuradapura', 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 35, 'count2': 54, 'count3': 181, 'count4': 340, 'count5': 442}}
column10: If you need to offer milk rice to Ruwanweliseya and Srimaha bodhi inform them and provide rice, freshmilk, cashew or else as topper ,pathra
column12:
One of the best places to stay when you go to Anuradhapura. 
Staff was very friendly and supportive. Starting from the Reception crew, they gave us a warm welcome and very informative. Customer service is best.

Hotel is located in a peaceful environment with beautiful atmosphere. 
It is very close to All the sacred places that you wish to go in anuradhapura visit. 
As per the requests they made Milk rice to offer  Sri Maha bodhi/ Ruwanweliseya.Provided very cleanly and nicely when we give all the ingredients. That is impressive. 

Highly recommend the hotel for it's cleanliness of all rooms, bathrooms and amenities. 

Their Food in buffet was very good. Lot of Varieities in food to select for each and every ages. Food was delicious and specially their breakfast was superb since they make porriage and milk rice that is so srilankan.

Chefs and supporting staf in buffet area also very kind and supportive.
Provided all the facilities very promptly.

Entertainment team was also superb in dinner time.Lovely music as per the custimers requests. Kids enjoyed alot

Specially their hospitality is superb not only for foreign customers as well as for the locals. Appreciate it alot.

Highly recommended this for all to visit and stay if you need a comfy vacation worth for the money you spent.

We wish all the best and success for the hotel and staff to keep up the good work and wish many more futue development plans to be succeeded :) .

column6: {'id': '4476135', 'name': 'Rajarata Hotel Anuradapura', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1052, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.330646, 'longitude': 80.419044, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d4476135-Reviews-Rajarata_Hotel_Anuradapura-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.rajaratahotel.lk', 'address': '77, Rowing Club Road Anuradapura, Anuradhapura 50000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '77, Rowing Club Road', 'street2': 'Anuradapura', 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 35, 'count2': 54, 'count3': 181, 'count4': 340, 'count5': 442}}
column12: We had a wonderful experience at Rajarata hotel. We would like to especially thank Shaluka for taking great care in attending to our requests and helping us out with our toddler during meal times. It is a beautiful hotel, placed in a peaceful environment. Great friendly reception and hotel staff. Thank you so much!

column6: {'id': '4476135', 'name': 'Rajarata Hotel Anuradapura', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1052, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.330646, 'longitude': 80.419044, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d4476135-Reviews-Rajarata_Hotel_Anuradapura-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.rajaratahotel.lk', 'address': '77, Rowing Club Road Anuradapura, Anuradhapura 50000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '77, Rowing Club Road', 'street2': 'Anuradapura', 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 35, 'count2': 54, 'count3': 181, 'count4': 340, 'count5': 442}}
column12: Rajarata Hotel is located near all the most important historical sites in Anuradhapura, ancient kingdom of Sri Lanka.  You can get a map of the sites from the front desk and could cover all of them in one day.  The front desk/reception at Rajarata Hotel is professional, courteous and willing to go the "extra mile" to make the guest stay as comfortable as possible.  During our stay, Ms. Samangi at the front desk was particularly helpful.  The dinner buffet with a Calypso Band added an eclectic touch to the Sri Lankan/Indian fusion meal.  Poolside breakfast was excellent.  It would have been better if the "action station" offered more variety but overall the whole dining setup was more than adequate.  Rajarata also has a "bar" with wide variety of options.  If you like beer, then try Lion Larger!  Rooms are comfortable as one would find in any 4 star hotel any where in the world.  Restroom was clean with ample hot water for shower.  Overall, a very good place for both discerning locals and foreign tourists for couple of days of stay while visiting Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka's historical kingdom.  Attached to this review is the Anuradhapura Historical Sites Map.

column10: Come in the off season as you have the pool to yourself most of the time. There isn’t the hassle from tuk tucks or others in this area.
column12: Lovely staff who go out of their way to assist in all areas, easy location that is a walk into town or a quick tuktuk ride, great food catering to all tastes and the pool was a welcoming sight after touring around. The area has a lot to offer and the people welcoming to all.

column12:
Stayed at this hotel for two nights during a tour of Sri Lanka and it was the one hotel we stayed in that wasn’t up to the standard expected. Rooms are basic and the pool wasn’t as clean as it should be.
It looked like the hotel was doing some minor renovations while we were there - in other rooms and some of the public areas - but a lot more needs to be done.
The food was fine but most of the other hotels the tour stayed in throughout Sri Lanka had better.
column13: Average hotel in need of modernisation

column6: {'id': '4476135', 'name': 'Rajarata Hotel Anuradapura', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 1052, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.330646, 'longitude': 80.419044, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d4476135-Reviews-Rajarata_Hotel_Anuradapura-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.rajaratahotel.lk', 'address': '77, Rowing Club Road Anuradapura, Anuradhapura 50000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '77, Rowing Club Road', 'street2': 'Anuradapura', 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 35, 'count2': 54, 'count3': 181, 'count4': 340, 'count5': 442}}
column12:
Nothing went wrong at this hotel, although it lacked a lift so having to use stairs to reach the first floor rooms might be difficulty for older guests.

The shower worked well as the water was sufficiently hot.  I closed the door from the bedroom to the bathroom as the latter's small window wouldn't shut.  This minimised the risk of mosquitoes pestering a sleeping guest.

One single bed in the room seemed in relatively poor condition but the other one was far better, so I chose the latter and slept well. Linen was of reasonable quality.

The aircon was excellent in my room but some others in our group complained.  One couple apparently experienced a 'low' of 26 degrees: a staff member attended and promised to fix it but was not again seen.

In our group stay of two nights, the buffet on the first night was outside, while on the second night, it was indoors.  There did not seem to be many mosquitoes.  Food was fine, and service also pleasing.

The pool was pleasant, and not over chlorinated.  The attendant was quick to supply a pool towel.

WiFi worked well.

Reception staff were helpful.

Overall though, the rooms need an upgrade.  The room experience was similar to an Australian or USA 2.5 to barely 3 star motel.  Nothing intinsically wrong, but below the standard one might expect from a property named an 'hotel'.
column13: Similar to a Westerners' 2.5 star motel

column12:
This hotel is listed as 4 star on booking but it certainly wasn’t 4 stars standard - it might be worth 2stars. 
Our room was small with a king bed and a single bed. The only other seat was a small stool. The small bathroom had fittings that were all corroded . There was a sliding door into the small shower that was misaligned. The bath towels were thin and frayed. The toiletries were minimal. 
The first night we had a buffet dinner outside around the pool. The second night we had buffet dinner in the restaurant. Buffets were ok. The pool area did not have a lot of shelter .

column12: A very private, peaceful and a relaxing place to spend time. Only a couple of minutes drive to the most popular attractions in Anuradhapura. Very clean, tidy and functional rooms. You have all the amenities you need for a short stay in the room including lots of charging spots to charge your devices, which I desperately needed to travel around the city during the day. But you might need an adapter/or request for one if you have foreign outlets. 24/7 excellent customer service. You can ask for almost anything and they will attend to you immediately to help and provide the services you need.  Lots of choices for meals. 100% recommend if you are visiting Anuradhapura.
column13: Private, clean and excellent customer service 24/7

column12: The staff were really nice to interact with. They were very accommodating with early morning outings to the nearby attractions. The hotel prepared milk rice for our visit to the Ruwanwali Seya in the morning at our request. You just need to provided the ingredients. The rooms are nicely maintained, with the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. From the spacious beds to the modern, sleek bathrooms. The balcony provides great natural lighting. The dining room is well staffed and equipped with a large range of dishes for all three meals. You have a beautiful view of the surrounding grounds and pool while you dine and kind staff to ready to accomodate to all your needs.

column12:
Our favorite hotel in Anuradhpura. If you want to see the sacred city of Anuradhapura or take a days rest before going to Trincomalee or Jaffna, RajarataHotel  is the ideal retreat. There is a beautiful walking path along the Kandy (Nuwara wawa) Lake where you can enjoy nature 
Priyantha the Manager, Sangeeth Front office Manager, Palitha room service  and Sanath Kitchen served us so well.
Thank you

The spacious rooms are elegantly furnished, providing a cozy retreat after a day of exploration. The hotel's central location makes it convenient for visiting nearby attractions. The dining experience is exceptional, with a variety of delectable dishes showcasing local flavors. Overall, the Rajarata Hotel is a commendable choice for travelers seeking a memorable stay in Anuradhapura.

column12: It is a beautiful, relaxing view. Very supportive staff. The cafeteria prepared separate small meals for kids. Beautiful pool. The rooms are quite spacious and comfortable. Close to all Buddhist religious places. Food was good. Nothing to complain. Highly recommend.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Spacious rooms with decks overlooking a lake and with 3 stupas in the distance. Great air conditioning. Excellent buffets for all 3 meals. We were there for 3 nights. I had to miss our group excursion to the Bodhi Tree so the hotel kindly arranged for a driver and car to take me there at sunset! The car was allowed to pass through several road barriers — finally I realized the hotel had generously sent breakfast for the monks, so the delivery was made to the monastery. Lovely!

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
During two afternoons of our three-day stay at Lake Forest Hotel (August 14-17), the entire premises boomed with dance music from weddings on the third floor and roof.  When we wanted to relax in the touted tranquility and air conditioning of our US$230 (plus tax) room, instead the room pounded with the base of the dance party happening literally on the other side the wall. We complained to the hotel and received the response, “But the music ends by 4:00 PM.” Apparently, the hotel’s “safe haven” status only applies in the evenings. When our driver intervened, the hotel offered to move our room, but it wouldn’t make a difference. The rooms, elevator, garden, and entire property (including the drivers’ rooms in the building across the parking lot) pulsed like a nightclub. 

Lake Forest can be a pricey luxury hotel for reconnecting with nature, or it can be a booming dance hall for loud and large Sri Lankan weddings. It cannot be both.

At our driver’s request, I am giving this hotel one additional star for offering him a free room and food. He felt very well taken care of.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: There was a problem when we arrived – they couldn’t find our booking or which room we should be in – seems the computer was down. Our room was spacious - with a balcony overlooking the lake. There were lots of staff but their English was limited – fine with “tea or coffee?” - but when asking a question there were issues. Jug and basics were provided in the room. Buffet dinner – had lots of choices but lots of fish with bones. The food at the buffet was far from hot – we were early diners, so time wasn’t a factor. Breakfast – many of the dishes seemed the same as dinner the night before. There was also freshly cooked omelette and egg hopper. At least these were hot. Some of the restaurant staff were too attentive – hovering by the table to whisk away the plate the moment you took the last mouthful. The lift door was a problem – it closed very quickly as the first person was getting in

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: The staff is so nice and helpful, they are all smiling. They look very happy which makes you understand that everything is all fine for them too. The rooms are clean and decorated good. Thanks to their kindness. The food is good, and everything was very clean.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
We stayed one night at the Lake Forest Hotel. We were checked in promptly on arrival and we told that we received an upgrade to the room we had booked. We booked the Family Suite and we stayed in a Family Suite Room!! No upgrade but we were still very happy with the room.

With 2 x Queen Beds and large bathroom and balconies the Family Suite was more than adequate for our one night stay. Beds were really comfortable and the views over Tissa Lake toward the temples were amazing.

Only downvote for the hotel was the food. Not that it wasnt ok. It was nice, but food temperatures were a little low which made eating feel a little like the food had been sitting for a while. Hoppers were great as usual. We ate Sri Lankan choices at the buffet but there was a selection of Western food as well.

A nice, comfortable hotel in a great location.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: The hotel is located at the lake overlooking the archeological site. Rooms are large and very clean, staff at the reception, bar and restaurant is very friendly. We had booked rooms with dinner and have to say that the buffet did disappoint us. Dinner started at 7.30 pm and when we arrived at 8 pm most of the food was finished. I would suggest to order a la carte in this hotel!
column13: Nice rooms, beautiful view and very friendly staff

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
It was a clean hotel with limited food options. The staff were friendly and helpful. However they had no food menu for dinner or breakfast. The place is beautiful and staff are friendly. 

They did not have duvets and provided a blanket on request!

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
I stayed here with my family in March this year, and we had a brilliant experience! The views are stunning and it was an ideal location to base ourselves to visit all the religious sites. We visited Ruwanweliseya and Sri Maha Bodiya in the evening around 6 pm and then came back to the hotel afterwards for dinner.

The communication throughout the booking process was also very good. We had no issues checking in although I had booked one room online and the others via Whatsapp/Email.

The staff at Lake Forest were exceptional. Their warm hospitality and attentiveness made us feel  and well cared for throughout the stay. They were always ready to assist with any request, ensuring that our experience was nothing short of perfect. 

We stayed in the lake view family suites. We were very happy with the rooms. They are very spacious with stunning views. All the amenities were also available.

I would highly recommend this hotel and we are looking forward to staying here again :)
column13: We had a nice and comfortable stay :)

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
Wonderful views of the lake, and even a rainbow! Clean and comfortable rooms. Friendly staff. Cosy and welcoming feel at this hotel, also a very nice lady making the hoppers at breakfast 😊
Only small problem was no hot water in the bathroom. Otherwise highly recommend this hotel.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
Whenever we go to Anuradhapura for a day trip, we go to this hotel for lunch. 

The Sri Lankan food is excellent value for money and very tasty.

The servers are courteous and attentive, bringing more food if required.

All the staff from the reception to restaurant servers are well trained for customer satisfaction.
column13: Best Sri Lankan food in Anuradhapura

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: The location is great on the lake and the buffet was good, but the a la carte menu is poor and very western tourist oriented.  Good swimming pool.  The service is poor.  No door person and unhelpful ladies at reception.  Checkout was a joke - told me my card was rejected when in fact it was their machine which had no connection. Argued they would only take local currency or USD and couldn’t take sterling.  Most unhelpful.  Staff need to go to hotel school as they appeared to lack basic hospitality skills.
column13: Nice hotel let down by poor staff.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column10: Pool is slightly on the small side and close to front of house
column12: The hotel has one of the best views of Anuradhapura overlooking the historic Stupas across the ancient Tisa river. The staff are very nice and friendly, and go above and beyond to serve the guests well. The food was a mixed experience and was a bit disappointing for the price you pay. The western choices for dinner were more or less the same and the Sri Lankan cuisine offered was quite ordinary. Breakfast buffet can also be improved in terms of variety and taste. We had A La Carte for lunch which was too expensive for what it was. Cleanliness of the rooms was good although the bed runners and the cushions on the bed seemed a bit unclean. If these can be improved the hotel with its picturesque views and friendly and attentive staff would be top class and worth the higher price tag.
column13: Good Hotel but the price tag is a bit high.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Set amidst picturesque surroundings, the hotel's cleanliness falls short, and dining experiences are marred by cold food and coffee sans milk. While staff are amiable, their training seems inadequate, reflected in basic English proficiency and a lack of etiquette. Nonetheless, the hotel enjoys a tranquil location with well-maintained grounds

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: We had a wonderful time at this hotel.  Very friendly staff, good food, and amazing lake views. The amiable staff members go above and beyond to ensure guests feel welcomed and attended to throughout their stay. One of the highlights of this hotel is its spectacular views, providing guests with memorable vistas to enjoy during their visit. Overall, Lake Forest hotel is highly recommended for those seeking a pleasant and memorable accommodation experience. AA++
column13: You won't be disappointed if you stay at this hotel.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Very clean, nice view, good service, very friendly staff, good food, perfect size room. We watched birds from the lobby. It’s surrounded by nice locals that you can explore on your own. Loved our stay here. It was super relaxing. I’d like to come to just relax next time.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
We had a wonderful stay at Lake Forest Hotel. Even though it is at the bank of the lake it is difficult to get a view of the three pagoda's from the lake view of the rooms. The staff is good food is good and service is good. However there are lots of cob webs and the cushioning inside the rooms are dirty. 
Overall we enjoyed the stay and the facilities provided by the staff are very good.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Our introduction to Sri Lanka and what a good one - this is just a lovely hotel, spotlessly clean with wonderfully helpful staff. Set overlooking a beautiful lake with amazing views across to the huge stupas in the old city. Our large room was beautifully decorated with a balcony overlooking the lake so great for bird-watching! The food was really good and they were so helpful providing packed breakfasts for us when we wanted an early start. Would thoroughly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Anuradhapura area. Richard & Aileen

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
Excellent visit. Very nice room with great view from balcony into anuradhapura and the shrines. We had dinner buffet which was good. It also had a nice bar.
Breakfast great.
I used the swimming pool before breakfast and it was clean and long enough to swim c 15metres.
service great.
overall would visit again.
column13: Thursday night stay dinner and breakfast

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column10: We had room 1109 and the dogs barked most of the night!
column12: We stayed for 1 night during our tour of Sri Lanka. The hotel is beautiful. The lakeside setting is very relaxing, and the views are stunning. Our room was big and clean with a comfy bed and good shiwer. Our package included breakfast and evening meal. The  food was OK, but nothing special. It is a lovely hotel and maybe if not staying as a tour package the food would be different.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
The moment you enter the hotel you are blown away by the view of the lake. The lake view rooms are really nice with balconies where one can sit and enjoy the gorgeous views. 

The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the hotel staff is very friendly and helpful.

The buffet spreads need to be better and have more variety.
column13: A small boutique hotel with exceptional views

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
The hotel views of the lake are beautiful and the wildlife in the lake is great to see.  The rooms are large and very nice and great service from the staff.  The hot water took a while to come through in the shower and only had a thin sheet on the bed but to be fair I didn’t let the hotel know about it as only there for 1 night.

Breakfast is not a huge choice but you have most things and it is very nice.

Lovely place to stay.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Very nice hotel! Great view and location! Not far away from the key points of interest. The lake is beautiful in the evenings! Food is also quite good. There were non-spicy options in the bouffe athl the breakfast and dinner. Definitely will come back one more time.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Perfect setting by a lake with beautiful views across the water. Lovely hotel, comfortable rooms and very friendly staff who did their best to make our stay a very happy one. A special thank you to Mr Sanath and his team who organised a vegetarian buffet dinner for fifty members of our family and friends. Everyone commented on the delicious food. A very memorable stay, thank you.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12:
I would absolutely recommend the Lake Forest hotel for an unforgettable experience! The whole staff was extremely courteous and the rooms spacious, very clean with amazing views of the stupas which they are lit up at night!
Aristea Markantonatou from Greece

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: We stayed here for two nights. The room was clean however the knob on the bathroom door was broken which was annoying. The towels were quite dirty and when we asked for new ones, they were dirty too so hopefully this issue is solved. It was also disappointing as we left to go sightseeing early in the morning and we came back in the afternoon and our room still hadn't been cleaned. We had a wonderful view from our hotel of the ancient Buddhist stupas. The food was nice and there was a nice view from the buffet area.
column13: Average hotel with a few upgrades required.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column10: Grab an early breakfast and visit the Sacred City before it gets too hot.
column12: View ancient sacred stupas (Ruwanweliseya, Jethwanaramaya, Mirisawetiya, Abhayagiriya) beyond the serene Tissa Lake, and Mihintale in the distance. A majestic sunrise above the forest. Excellent amenities and meals. Genuine Sri Lankan hospitality. All of this and more at this gem of a hotel just a couple of kilometres from the archaeological heartland. Thoroughly enjoyed our family holiday, and highly recommend the hotel.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Absolutely love the location on this hotel. Stunning night view of the distant Buddhist Temples. Really good food. We ate breakfast lunch and dinner here and each meal was fabulous. Also enjoyed the pool. The room was spacious and very comfortable.
column13: Magnificent view of the lake and Buddhist temples - very relaxing

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Large, comfortable rooms with balconies overlooking the lake. Stunning views over to the stupas of Anuradhapura, which were lit at night. And an abundance of water birds to watch during the day. The food was good and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend if you need a calm place to stay in Anuradhapura.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: It was a very comfortable hotel with a beautiful room overlooking a vast lake. The view particularly at night when the Stupa’s were lit was stunning. The staff were very friendly and efficient. The food was very good and we had no complaints at all. We were able to go to Kalu Diya Pokuna Natural Black Water Pond which was a very peaceful and natural place around a huge pond with mountainous views. Would highly recommend a visit there. All in all a very good experience at The Lake Forest Hotel.
column13: Very comfortable hotel with beautiful views.

column6: {'id': '18816510', 'name': 'The Lake Forest Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 149, 'locationString': 'Anuradhapura, North Central Province', 'latitude': 8.328517, 'longitude': 80.37167, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304132-d18816510-Reviews-The_Lake_Forest_Hotel-Anuradhapura_North_Central_Province.html', 'website': 'https://lakeforesthotel.com/', 'address': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane, Anuradhapura 50270 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '103 Tissa Wewa Lane', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Anuradhapura', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '50270'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 110}}
column12: Very friendly, welcoming and accommodating staff. Food was of an excellent quality and the rooms were clean and well kept. The hotel is well located- very close to the sacred sites for our pilgrimage. The WiFi in the room was also very useful!
column13: Lovely hotel with a beautiful view

The rooms were clean, although some chairs in the room were not very clean at all. The meals at the buffet were delicious.

Dulanjana and restaurant manager was very helpful and service was excellent .location is excellent and beach was very clean up my family was enjoying very well. we come back in next year also.

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column12:
Our stay at Jetwing Surf Hotel was nothing short of exceptional, from start to finish. We stayed in a spacious sea view cabana that was perfectly equipped for all weather conditions, whether rain (umbrellas) or shine (bug spray). The cabana offered a great balance of luxury and comfort, with more than enough space to relax and enjoy the serene surroundings.

The service was impeccable throughout our stay. Special mention to Dinesh, who went above and beyond to organize a beautiful birthday meal right on the beach—an experience we’ll never forget. Our butler, Dulanjana, was outstanding. He was professional, attentive, and made sure we had no worries during our stay. His care and attention to detail truly enhanced our experience.

The food at Jetwing Surf was incredible. Every meal was a visual and culinary delight, thanks to the talented chef. The quality and presentation were always of the highest standard. Even during our early morning safari, the hotel ensured that we had a packed breakfast and drinks ready for our 5 AM departure, which was a thoughtful touch.

Our safari at Kumana National Park was absolutely fantastic and a highlight of our trip. This was all recommended and arranged by the resort.  We were lucky enough to see leopards, elephants, deer, and so many other animals up close in their natural habitat. The wildlife was abundant, and the best part was how peaceful it felt—at times, it seemed like we had the entire park to ourselves!

The experience was well-organized and truly immersive. The beauty of Kumana lies not just in the animals but also in the quiet, untouched wilderness. It’s a must-do for anyone visiting the area, and we highly recommend it!

We also indulged in in-room massages, which were fantastic—perfect for unwinding. The pool was clean and a great spot to relax during the day.

This resort truly goes above and beyond, treating guests like royalty. We are already recommending it to our friends and family and cannot wait to return ourselves. A huge thank you to the team for making our stay so memorable!

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column12: Super Service , Very Beautiful Hotel , Nice Food , Excellent Location , Very Helpful Staff Nice View Everything is super beautiful hotel. Cabana is very nice , Difference experience for cabana superb. Breakfast is so nice and super dinner.

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column12: Our family stayed at Jetwing Surf for 3 nights/4 days. It was our first time there and we thoroughly enjoyed it. Occupancy of the hotel was low, but the service was exceptional. The food menu was extensive and meant that every day/meal we were able to choose something different and the taste was 10/10. The Cabana's were a nice touch of glam and simple and being close to the beach meant that you could hear the waves whilst laid in bed. The GM Hafi was very attentive throughout our stay and ensured all of our expectations were met. "A special mention to the Head Chef Sineth. Who came and spoke to us at every meal time to see what more he could do and very generous in listenting to the kids requests for food. He also offered a private tour of the kitchen and gave the opportunity for my daughter to do a kitchen cooking class. Will 100% stay there again.

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column12:
Jetwing Surf is a beautiful place to relax and enjoy some quiet time by the beach. The location is amazing, with a peaceful and natural vibe. We loved the open design of the buildings, and the eco-friendly approach really made the stay feel special. The staff were super friendly and always ready to help with anything we needed. The views during meals were just breathtaking. If you're looking for a calm getaway with a bit of adventure, Jetwing Surf is the perfect spot!

Follow us on TikTok and Instagram for more travel content: @lankan_quests

Check out our reel from the QR code
column13: Relaxation Meets Nature at Jetwing Surf

column12:
On arrival we were warmly welcomed by wonderful staff.

Check in was smooth and the rooms are enormous. The roof is amazing!

Such an idyllic location and right on the beach

I loved the freshness and quality of the food, and any request could be arranged.

Adding the surfboard bagtag was a nice touch

We would like to thank Jetwing Surf, Pottuvil, on behalf of Unforgettable Sri Lanka for being such fabulous hosts. We wish we could have stayed longer. We would not hesitate to recommend this property.

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column10: At first we thought that it was a very long journey but it only took us 6 hours travel time from Rajagiriya and it was a pleasant drive!!
column12:
Dear Mr Hafi,

Thank you for your personalized service which meant a lot to us.

You and your staff went out of your way to make sure that all our needs were met.

Our butler Pawan was extremely helpful and was there all the time to assist us. He was well trained and always had a smile on his face and provided exceptional service to us.

Your room boy Oshada was very friendly and made sure that our room was always clean and neat and tidy.

The food was excellent and your staff were very accommodating and allowed us to make changes without making a fuss.

The cabana was spacious and inviting. The bed was very comfortable and linen was soft and cozy!

The pool was very inviting and the water was clean and the temperature was perfect and the pool boy Ajith was very friendly.

We had a cabana with ocean view and were able to enjoy the sunrise without going out of the room.

Overall we enjoyed our stay at JetWing Pottuvil and will return for sure!!
column13: First visit to Pottuvil/Kumana but will not be the last!!

This was our first visit to Jetwing Surf and have to say it is absolutely amazing, the Cabanas are extremely clean and tidy, staff excellent and the food was amazing. Credit to everyone for making our eight night stay unforgettable.
The sunrises are amazing and well worth making a cup of tea and sitting on the beach to watch.
We definitely recommend Jetwing Surf to anyone.

column12:
This is my second stay at a Jetwing hotel and as expected it was one of the best experiences I had in my travels in Sri Lanka! Staff were very pleasant, kind and friendly. Had a great collection of vegetarian food. Chef even offered us packed sandwiches for the road. 

It’s also very nice to see their dedication to sustainability. All the water bottles were glass bottles refilled in the facility including shampoo, conditioner, etc. 

Plan to visit other Jetwing locations in future!

column12:
Jetwing Surf is a bespoke hotel of 18 sizeable and secluded Cabanas nestling alongside a beautiful beach with constant sound of the waves.
The cabanas are beautifully appointed and capacious.  A great night’s sleep is guaranteed.
There is a good sized pool and excellent restaurant and the chef will adjust the food to your liking.
As always, it is the charming and attentive staff who make this hotel so special.  To a person they are smiley and friendly and really make your stay a special event.
column13: Fabulous cabanas overlooking a beautiful beach and frothing surf

column10: Make sure you take a torch since the nights get pretty dark after dinners
column12:
The hotel had excellent ambiance. During our stay the hotel only had a maximum of 5 cabanas occupied so we had them move us to seafront ones. This was done without any hassle.
The staff, although the presence of language limitations, were particularly happy and willing to help.

Our personal butler, Dulanjana, turned ti be our hero during our stay. He was smart with wonderful disposition.

Sadly we learnt that Jetwing did not offer it’s tour drivers free breakfast, lunch or dinner. They appeared to pay for their meals which we were told, not to be worth the price. We hope Jetwing will review this soon.

All in all we had a lovely stay.

column12:
We just concluded a lovely weekend at Jetwing Surf. The staff took very good care of us. Since we were vegetarians the chef made and extra effort to have a special vegetarian menu for us. 
We also did an excursion to Kudumbigala which the hotel arranged for us.
The cabanas are very unique and comfortable and offer beautiful views of the sea. If you wake up early you can catch a breathtaking sunrise.

column10: Not crowded. Excellent holiday location for couples  as well as families.
column12:
This was our maiden visit from India  to Sri Lanka and also to Jetwing Surf  and Kottukal Beach House at Pottuvil , in connection with solemnising marriage ceremony of our elder son  with a British bride. The journey through and stay in SL were superb , and the Jetwing Surf and Kottukal Beach house ,Pottuvil, were special. This marriage celebration hoisting was also, it seems, was maiden for the Jetwing Pottuvil. The rooms, Breakfast-Lunch-Dinner services, Venue preparation, Haldi ceremoney, Sangeet ceremony, Marriage ceremony, Dance and cultural  functions , marriage dinners on sea beach,  arranging Marriage Registration at the venue etc were all meticulously planned and executed to perfection.
Our hearts were filled with with joy and happiness by seeing all the arrangement at the venue, the sea beach, the scenic beauty of the resort and the spacious rooms  and the decorated swimming pool sites to suit the occasions.
The food services served at the occasions were very good.
The sea beaches, lawns, swimming pools etc, especially at Kottukal Beach House, were so beautiful that one has to get lost into one's romantic days. 
Above all , the Management and staff of the both the resorts deserve all praise for their services, behaviour, courtesy and ever willingness on their parts to be of any kind of help at any time were praiseworthy. 
We wish  to return to this venue again on any other occasion  with friends and family. 
Certian suggestions : 
1. The road from Jetwing Surf to Kottukal Beach house , about 100 mtrs stretch length, is not metalled - it is broken . Walking is difficult on the road. Better it is repaired and maintained by both the resorts.
2. There is paucity of light on the road from Jetwing Surf to Kottukal Beach House.  Both the resorts can look into this aspect and arrange proper lights.
3. Jetwing surf can maintain a e-rickshaw ( tuktuk) service within their resort and also between the two resorts so that commuting between the two places is not troblesome. 
Save and above , our overall experince in Jetwing and SL were tremendous and memorable.
column13: Destination marriage at Jetwing Surf , Sri Lanka

column12:
Rohini S
Colombo, Sri Lanka
1929
Jetwing Surf Pottuvil, Sri Lanka - a place for R & R.
Review of Jetwing Surf
Reviewed 13 Nov 2022

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  * * * *

I would like to start by referring to my earlier review posted to Trip Advisor dated 13th November 2022 re the visit to Jetwing Surf, Pottuvil Point, Sri Lanka.

This second visit was on Sunday 4th February 2024 when eleven of us booked into 6 Cabanas in great trepidation as the others had at the last minute read my 13th November 2022 review.  Some of the servers recognized us & assured us that we will be happy this time & we were.

All Cabanas had glass panels placed right up to the architecturally beautiful Conic Rooves, blocking out any insects & creepy crawlies which made our previous stay miserable.   They only had fans inside the Cabanas then.  Now they have installed air conditioners too.  

It would have cost them quite a bit.  However, I hope guests will read this review of mine & visit the place hopefully not just for a day or two.  Why not make it a beautiful vacation during the season and I assure you, no one will regret it.

The No. 12 Cabana my husband & I occupied had an extremely comfortable King-size bed with pillows so perfect, only the alarm would wake us from sleep.  All other amenities from a mini bar, coffee/tea service to hair dryer, little toiletries, bathrobes, beach slippers, umbrellas etc. etc. were there for our use.  The shower toilet area is unique with a style of its own.

Though there is no Television set in the Resort, we had free Wi-Fi service.

There was a hiccup in our No.12 Cabana which was not the case with the ones occupied by our friends.  The Toilet had a suction issue which the management tried hard to correct not quite successfully & in fact, offered a change of Cabana too which we did not take up.  

The service all round was excellent.  Led by Pavan (butler/server/other roles), the staff worked at tandem & the Chef de cuisine made sure we had the desired à la carte meals presented in decorative style.  On this occasion, all meals were flavoursome & the quantity just right.   Way to go Chef Gemunu Chameera & Team!

The Swimming pool & the surrounding area in the resort is beautiful.  Once more, I hope the management will make the (romantic) lighting on the ground better as we had to use our cellphone lights to walk the area leading to the dining hall. 

Our trip this time was not during the season.  One should go to the East Coast during the dry season which is from May to September when the beaches are pristine, the sea of Sri Lanka is calmer & water sports are possible.

As a final note, my husband & I were absolutely thrilled with the Management as they had in a matter of 15 months, attended to my & maybe other guests’ previous comments about shortfalls.   

Kudos & blessings to the Jetwing Surf Resident Manager Mr. Azeem Hafi, & his dedicated, pleasant Team.

Rohini Seneviratne.

column6: {'id': '12949765', 'name': 'Jetwing Surf', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 378, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.879561, 'longitude': 81.84314, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d12949765-Reviews-Jetwing_Surf-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingsurf/', 'address': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road Hidayapuram, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'P20, Kottukal Beach Road', 'street2': 'Hidayapuram', 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 39, 'count5': 308}}
column10: The area is still quiet and underdeveloped for tourism compared to other parts of Sri Lanka but great for exploring the east coast.
column12: Beautiful and relaxing hotel situated next to the beach. Relatively small with about 20 or so cabanas / huts but each is very generously sized and can easily accommodate 4 people. Staff were great and very attentive with our own ‘personal butler’. As the hotel is relatively small the menu is a la carte with a western and Srilankan option. East part of Sri Lanka is still  underdeveloped compared to the south west with smaller surfer hotels along the coast. Have to be willing to be more adventurous if you want to go out of the hotel. As it is a surfer destination and the season starts in March / April a lot of the nearby smaller hotels were closed as was the local surf school.

column12:
A group of beach huts in an idyllic beach location.
Fabulous pool overlooking the sandy beach and Sri Lankan ocean. The grounds are grazed by goats and cattle. Eagles, egrets, kingfishers, mynah birds are ever present.
Our beach hut was almost brilliant, an outside shower was great fun, but the plumbing and door fittings etc. did not quite work properly.
The surrounding area very much a shanty town and quite a challenging transit through!
The food was good, but not up to the 5 star quality and taste that we have had everywhere else in Sri Lanka.
column13: Great pool to have a cold beer by.

column6: {'id': '20113947', 'name': 'Whisky Point Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 93, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.905878, 'longitude': 81.8433, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d20113947-Reviews-Whisky_Point_Resort-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.whiskypointresort.lk', 'address': 'Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Whisky Point Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 90}}
column12: This is a really magical place. It's the rare opportunity to actually sleep in a cabana in a safe environment on a secluded beach. You fall asleep and wake up hearing the sea. The staff are so kind and fun, you can chill out in the sun and have beers and food brought to you, or you can go surfing, go on safari or visit arugum bay easily by tuk tuk, knowing you are coming home to a peaceful piece of heaven. The food is really good, the service is top quality and it kind of seems like nothing is a problem, everyone is very chilled out and this helps you to do the same. Bring a book and enjoy some rare peace while you relax here

column6: {'id': '20113947', 'name': 'Whisky Point Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 93, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.905878, 'longitude': 81.8433, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d20113947-Reviews-Whisky_Point_Resort-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.whiskypointresort.lk', 'address': 'Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Whisky Point Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 90}}
column12:
From the minute you check-in, you know you have arrived at a very special place. 
If you are looking for the hustle & bustle of Arugam or similar, this is unfortunately not for you.  However, if you are looking for a wonderful escape with beautiful scenery & tranquillity, you are in luck. 
The rooms are exceptionally clean & beautifully but simply decorated with everything you need. Service is always prompt &  delivered with a smile. Food is incredible. 
Anna is a fantastic yoga teacher and the skills she has taught me, I'll cherish for years to come. 
Every team member is a wonderful addition to the family and makes it totally unforgettable! 
Thanks for an amazing 2 week stay in your little paradise.

column6: {'id': '20113947', 'name': 'Whisky Point Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 93, 'locationString': 'Pottuvil, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province', 'latitude': 6.905878, 'longitude': 81.8433, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g608525-d20113947-Reviews-Whisky_Point_Resort-Pottuvil_Arugam_Bay_Eastern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.whiskypointresort.lk', 'address': 'Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Whisky Point Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Pottuvil', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '32500'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 90}}

column12: I stayed with a friend for a couple of days and then solo and I couldn't ask for a better accommodation for that time! The place is so lovely, charming, clean and just perfect to enjoy a cosy vacation. It's right next to the ocean, you can hear the waves when you lay in bed, hammocks and beach lounges to chill, perfect service, etc. so you can just have a relaxing time. Did some yoga with Anna, which was amazing and very sweet, having chats about our lives - both Nicolette and Anna are just angels and so welcoming + staff is super nice and helpful as well. An honest thank you for those amazing days with you!
column13: Beautiful place with a big heart
